'''Warden of Konda''' is a [[Random Event]] World Quest that occurs in [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
#Scare the Pigeons off with any method

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Paimon:''' Oh no, those pigeons are gonna ruin the crops!
:'''Paimon:''' We'd better scare them off, or those crops are a lost cause!
;(If a pigeon is killed)
:'''Paimon:''' Oh, the boar's dead...
:'''Paimon:''' Paimon would feel bad, if it weren't for those crops... and pigeon meat...
:'''Paimon:''' Yup, that definitely makes Paimon feel better!
;(After the pigeons were scared)
:'''Paimon:''' Haha! The crops are saved!
{{Dialogue End}}
